name: Winter Provisions
description:
You are a squirrel that is preparing for winter, you must grow enough food so that you can survive the cold season. Bu there are hunters which wish to hunt and kill you for sport. This project was made in 48 hours for the Mix and Game Jam 2020, all art assets were made specifically for this jam and all code is by me.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Space - Interact

Escape - InGame menu 

WARNING! If you exit game or leave to the main menu, your progress will NOT BE SAVED.

Thanks for playing!
